page.title: 15CLUBS AND SPORTS
page.content: Our survey investigated the types of Clubs and Sports that Harbury villagers were involved in. The most popular clubs for the boys were the Scout Group, Tennis Club and Rugby Club. The girls were involved mostly in the Tennis Club, Girls Club and the Guides. Most people said that they were in a club for pure enjoyment, 65% being involved in one sort of a club or another, suiting all age groups. Here are just a few: Womens Institute, Young Wives, Theatre Group,Bird Watching Group, Badminton, Keep Fit plus many more. The types of clubs that people felt would be useful to have were a Swimming Club (25%), Youth Club (25%), Computer Club (l5%) and a Cricket Club (l5%).
